data.caption: Fixed Record Date for Interim Dividend
data.news_body:
India Motor Parts & Accessories Ltd has informed BSE that the Company has fixed January 29 2026 as the Record Date for the purpose of payment of Interim Dividend.

The interim dividend will be paid on or before February 20 2026.

data.caption: Board declares Interim Dividend
data.news_body: India Motor Parts & Accessories Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on January 22 2026 inter-alia has declared an Interim Dividend of Rs.10/- (100%) per equity share of face value Rs. 10/- each for the financial year 2025-26 on the paid-up equity share capital of Rs. 12.48 Crores.
